title: [Health] Scientists find US adults gained nearly 2 pounds a month in lockdown. A decline in physical activity and overeating amid lockdown contributed to American weight gain. Individuals experienced a steady weight gain at a rate of .59 lbs for every 10 days spent in lockdown.

[Health] Natural sounds like bird song and flowing water found to induce positive health effects, including decreased pain, improved mood, lower stress, and enhanced cognitive performance. Also, natural sounds + urban noise is better for health than just urban noise.
